data.lyric:
[ti:After Hours]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Deluxe) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]After Hours - The Weeknd
[00:03.71]Lyrics by：Mario Winans/Jason "DaHeala" Quenneville/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Ahmad Balshe/Carlo "Illangelo" Montagnese
[00:07.42]Composed by：Mario Winans/Jason "DaHeala" Quenneville/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Ahmad Balshe/Carlo "Illangelo" Montagnese
[00:11.14]Thought I almost died in my dream again
[00:15.64]Baby almost died
[00:18.94]Fightin' for my life I couldn't breathe again
[00:25.93]I'm fallin' in too deep
[00:31.98]Oh oh
[00:34.82]Without you I can't sleep
[00:41.03]Fallin' in
[00:43.45]'Cause my heart belongs to you
[00:48.13]I'll risk it all for you
[00:52.53]I want you next to me
[00:56.90]This time I'll never leave
[01:01.39]I wanna share babies
[01:05.66]Protection we won't need
[01:10.00]Your body next to me
[01:14.58]Is just a memory
[01:18.93]I'm fallin' in too deep oh
[01:27.61]Without you I can't sleep
[01:36.58]Insomnia relieve oh
[01:43.43]Talk to me without you I can't breathe
[02:29.60]My darkest hours
[02:32.05]Girl I felt so alone inside of this crowded room
[02:36.46]Different girls on the floor distractin' my thoughts of you
[02:40.84]I turned into the man I used to be to be
[02:47.13]Put myself to sleep
[02:49.64]Just so I can get closer to you inside my dreams
[02:54.02]Didn't wanna wake up 'less you were beside me
[02:58.43]I just wanted to call you and say and say
[03:04.64]Oh baby
[03:07.40]Where are you now when I need you most
[03:11.74]I'd give it all just to hold you close
[03:16.11]Sorry that I broke your heart your heart
[03:22.44]Never comin' down uh
[03:24.89]I was running away from facin' reality uh
[03:29.31]Wastin' all of my time out living my fantasies
[03:33.63]Spendin' money to compensate compensate
[03:39.97]'Cause I want you baby uh
[03:42.52]I be livin' in heaven when I'm inside of you
[03:46.92]It was simply a blessing wakin' beside you
[03:51.34]I'll never let you down again again
[03:57.51]Oh baby
[04:00.11]Where are you now when I need you most
[04:04.51]I'd give it all just to hold you close
[04:08.87]Sorry that I broke your heart your heart
[04:15.07]I said baby
[04:17.75]I'll treat you better than I did before
[04:22.09]I'll hold you down and not let you go
[04:26.61]This time I won't break your heart your heart yeah
[04:43.68]I know it's all my fault
[04:48.15]Made you put down your guard
[04:52.49]I know I made you fall
[04:56.61]Then said you were wrong for me
[04:59.34]I lied to you I lied to you I lied to you
[05:02.68]To you
[05:03.70]Can't hide the truth I'd stay with her in spite of you
[05:08.12]You did some things that you regret still ride for you
[05:12.40]'Cause this house is not a home
[05:16.23]Without my baby
[05:19.34]Where are you now when I need you most
[05:23.88]I gave it all just to hold you close
[05:28.24]Sorry that I broke your heart your heart
[05:34.30]And I said baby
[05:37.11]I'll treat you better than I did before
[05:41.42]I'll hold you down and not let you go
[05:45.86]This time I won't break your heart your heart no
data.trans:
[ti:After Hours]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Deluxe) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.71]//
[00:07.42]//
[00:11.14]还以为我会再一次醉死梦中
[00:15.64]几乎醉生梦死
[00:18.94]不屈只为我的人生 哪怕我再也无法呼吸
[00:25.93]我无法自拔的沉沦其中
[00:31.98]//
[00:34.82]没有你 我辗转难眠
[00:41.03]沉沦其中
[00:43.45]只因我的心属于你
[00:48.13]我甘愿为你不顾一切
[00:52.53]我希望你依偎我身旁
[00:56.90]这一次我绝不会离开
[01:01.39]我只想与你分享关爱
[01:05.66]我们不需要所谓的保护
[01:10.00]你 依偎在我身边
[01:14.58]不过是往昔回忆
[01:18.93]我无法自拔的沉沦其中
[01:27.61]没有你 我辗转难眠
[01:36.58]缓解失眠
[01:43.43]与我说话吧 没有你 我甚至无法呼吸
[02:29.60]我最黑暗的时光
[02:32.05]我仍会感到孤单 纵使房间里人潮拥挤
[02:36.46]这里形形色色的女孩 让我不再沉浸于对你的思念
[02:40.84]我依然是过去的那个我
[02:47.13]强迫自己安然入睡
[02:49.64]这样我就可以在梦中靠近你
[02:54.02]我不想一觉醒来你却不在我身边
[02:58.43]我只想一如既往的那样称呼你
[03:04.64]哦宝贝
[03:07.40]在我最需要你的时候你在哪里呢？
[03:11.74]我付出一切只为抱紧你
[03:16.11]对不起 我伤了你的心 你的心
[03:22.44]绝不想就此分开
[03:24.89]正是我竭力逃避的现实
[03:29.31]虚掷光阴 活在我所谓的幻想中
[03:33.63]疯狂挥霍只为弥补心底的空虚
[03:39.97]因为我需要你 宝贝
[03:42.52]当我在你心底 我仿佛置身天堂
[03:46.92]在你身边醒来是多幸福的一件事啊
[03:51.34]我绝不会让你对我彻底失望
[03:57.51]哦宝贝
[04:00.11]在我最需要你的时候你在哪里呢？
[04:04.51]我付出一切只为抱紧你
[04:08.87]对不起 我伤了你的心 你的心
[04:15.07]我说宝贝 
[04:17.75]我比以往更加爱你
[04:22.09]我会紧握你的手 绝不让你离开我
[04:26.61]这一次 我绝不会再让你心碎
[04:43.68]我知道全是我的错
[04:48.15]让你放下所有戒备
[04:52.49]我知道我让你沦陷其中
[04:56.61]我曾说过你并非我的良配
[04:59.34]那是我骗了你 骗了你 骗了你
[05:02.68]你
[05:03.70]我没有和你而是和她待在一起 是无法否定的事实
[05:08.12]你也做了许多让自己悔恨不已的事
[05:12.40]没有了亲爱的你
[05:16.23]这房子已不算是个家了
[05:19.34]在我最需要你的时候你在哪里呢？
[05:23.88]我付出一切只为抱紧你
[05:28.24]对不起 我伤了你的心 你的心
[05:34.30]我说宝贝 
[05:37.11]我比以往更加爱你
[05:41.42]我会紧握你的手 绝不让你离开我
[05:45.86]这一次 我绝不会再让你心碎
